metadata.Title: CVE-2021-25786 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in QPDF version 10.0.4, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted .pdf file to Pl_ASCII85Decoder::write parameter in libqpdf.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This appears to be a dupe of CVE-2021-36978, same bug and fix commits. Updating as such.

criterions.comment: qpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
